title: Remote Mathematics e-Learning Application Utilization Training for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Arithmetic Skills and Basic Smartphone Usage
context.additional_context: Corporate manager-targeted program requiring smartphone-based learning in PC-unavailable environments. Aims to resolve learning efficiency decline caused by fragmented platform usage

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously manage weekly learning schedules (3 video lectures, 2 quizzes) via e-learning applications
Learners can post solutions to mathematical problems presented in real-time video classes on the application forum with over 80% consistency

Learners can solve at least three job-related mathematical problems (e.g., ratio calculations, budget estimations) using modular learning materials (videos, PDFs, quizzes) provided on an integrated platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
